title: Case-Based Instructional Design Practice: Collaborative Learning Strategies in Online Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational educational theories and instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: A process where pre-service teachers analyze real educational scenarios in VR environments and engage in collaborative learning.

learning_goals: Learners can connect instructional design principles to real-world educational problems through case analysis.
Learners can propose improved solutions incorporating peer feedback using small-group collaboration tools.
Learners can develop concrete instructional design solutions based on cases analyzed in VR simulations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
